mapper.select:
SELECT cidlz.id, cidlz.check_id, cidlz.check_type, cidlz.age_min, cidlz.age_max, cidlz.bmi_min, cidlz.bmi_max, cidlz.bodyheight_min, cidlz.bodyheight_max, cidlz.weight_min, cidlz.weight_max, cidlz.leve_1_procent, cidlz.leve_2_procent, cidlz.leve_3_procent, cidlz.leve_4_procent, cidlz.leve_5_procent FROM check_item_degr_leve_zhanbi cidlz WHERE cidlz.check_id = ${check_id} AND cidlz.check_type = ${check_type}
ORDER BY ${orderby}
